metadata.title: CVE-2022-36763 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
EDK2 is susceptible to a vulnerability in the Tcg2MeasureGptTable()function, allowing a user to trigger a heap buffer overflow via a localnetwork. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may result in acompromise of confidentiality, integrity, and/or availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-36763` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

efi-shell-aa64 - 2023.11-5
efi-shell-arm - 2023.11-5
efi-shell-ia32 - 2023.11-5
efi-shell-riscv64 - 2023.11-5
efi-shell-x64 - 2023.11-5
ovmf - 2023.11-5
ovmf-ia32 - 2023.11-5
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2023.11-5
qemu-efi-arm - 2023.11-5
qemu-efi-riscv64 - 2023.11-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2023.11-5').
